name: agent
description: Event Destination Map for LO Agent
content:
<EventDest>  <!--zone_NA Ashburn PROD vmware-->
<tkBookmark collection="dest" name="0"/>  <Destination id="1" default="Y" stat="N" type="M" clear_cache="N" master_reset="N" max_cache_size="30000">    <Server location="127.0.0.1" port="5530" />  </Destination>  <StatEvent name="EE_HEARTBEAT" interval="9" /></EventDest>"
